players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was found dead, which means the mafia is still among us. We need to be careful and consider our votes wisely today."
Bob: "Based on my investigation last night, I discovered that Diana is the mafioso. We should all vote to arrest her today."
Diana: "Bob is lying—there’s no way a real detective outs themselves this early without proof. Alice, think: why would he suicide-claim Day 1 unless he’s the mafioso trying to rush my arrest?"

Diana: "Bob, if you’re the detective, name who you investigated Night 0 and explain why you chose me over Alice after Charlie’s death; Alice, this rush is classic scum—let’s not turbo-arrest on a single unproven claim."

Bob: "Charlie was the only other villager, so I chose Diana as my investigation target to identify the mafioso. Alice, if you were the detective, you'd have claimed by now. We must trust logic and vote Diana."
You: "Bob's claim seems credible since he mentioned Charlie's role, which turned out to be true. Diana, your reaction feels defensive. I'm inclined to trust Bob's deduction."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was found dead, which means the mafia is still among us. We need to be careful and consider our votes wisely today."
You: "Based on my investigation last night, I discovered that Diana is the mafioso. We should all vote to arrest her today."
Diana: "Bob is lying—there’s no way a real detective outs themselves this early without proof. Alice, think: why would he suicide-claim Day 1 unless he’s the mafioso trying to rush my arrest?"

Diana: "Bob, if you’re the detective, name who you investigated Night 0 and explain why you chose me over Alice after Charlie’s death; Alice, this rush is classic scum—let’s not turbo-arrest on a single unproven claim."

You: "Charlie was the only other villager, so I chose Diana as my investigation target to identify the mafioso. Alice, if you were the detective, you'd have claimed by now. We must trust logic and vote Diana."
Alice: "Bob's claim seems credible since he mentioned Charlie's role, which turned out to be true. Diana, your reaction feels defensive. I'm inclined to trust Bob's deduction."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was found dead, which means the mafia is still among us. We need to be careful and consider our votes wisely today."
Bob: "Based on my investigation last night, I discovered that Diana is the mafioso. We should all vote to arrest her today."
You: "Bob is lying—there’s no way a real detective outs themselves this early without proof. Alice, think: why would he suicide-claim Day 1 unless he’s the mafioso trying to rush my arrest?"

You: "Bob, if you’re the detective, name who you investigated Night 0 and explain why you chose me over Alice after Charlie’s death; Alice, this rush is classic scum—let’s not turbo-arrest on a single unproven claim."

Bob: "Charlie was the only other villager, so I chose Diana as my investigation target to identify the mafioso. Alice, if you were the detective, you'd have claimed by now. We must trust logic and vote Diana."
Alice: "Bob's claim seems credible since he mentioned Charlie's role, which turned out to be true. Diana, your reaction feels defensive. I'm inclined to trust Bob's deduction."
